================
Work Report Tool
================


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/work_report_tool.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/work_report_tool

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/mradecki/work_report_tool.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.com/mradecki/work_report_tool

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/work-report-tool/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://work-report-tool.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Tool generating HTML reports based on results fetched from Hubstaff API v1


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://work-report-tool.readthedocs.io.
